Package stocks.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IViewInterface  
    PanelInterface
    an interface to create different panels
    PortfolioGUIView
    an interface to create GUI view by extending IViewInterface.
    PortfolioView
    This interface acts as view for virtual-trading application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuyStocksPanel
    This class represents a panel for buy stocks.
    CreatePortfolioPanel
    This class represents a panel for creating a portfolio.
    DollarCostAvgStrategyPanel
    This class represents a panel for creating DollarCostAvgStrategy.
    InvestFixedAmountStrategyPanel
    This class represents a panel for creating InvestFixedAmountStrategy.
    PortfolioGUIViewImpl
    Represents view class to create GUI frame.
    PortfolioViewImpl
    This class implements the methods of PortfolioView which is an interface for text UI.
    QueryPortfolioPanel
    This class represents a panel fo QueryPortfolio action.
    SellStocksPanel
    This class represents a panel for SellStocks action.
    ViewFactory
    This class represents a factory class to generate view objects.
